p: It is demonstrated that dominant constitutes of used ZCEO in this study are geraniol, carvacrol, and thymol that have antimicrobial activity. It was suggested that the antimicrobial activity of geraniol is related to its capability to penetrate into the interior of the bacterial cell and afterward interfering with intracellular sites and also inhibiting the efflux mechanism (Bhattamisra et al., 2018).
